== Ayancheri (CT) (627362) ==

Ayancheri (CT) is a town in the [[Vadakara]] taluka of [[Kozhikode]] district with an area of 20.81 sq. km. and harbouring 5864 households with total population of 26293 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kozhikode]] is at a distance of 53 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 470 km. Male population is 12372 and female population is 13921. Scheduled Caste population is 707 and Scheduled Tribes population is 79. Census Location Code of the town is 627362<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 53 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 53 km. Railway station is at Vadakara at a distance of 8 km.
